title: So, Azir walks into a bar(d)...
body:
[](http://media.tumblr.com/cba5a19f230ad2e4bb4034359bc20bfb/tumblr_inline_nbh1akjcFH1sn5bmb.jpg)
{{champion:268}} BARD-TENDER. I REQUIRE A DRINK.
{{champion:432}} ?
{{champion:268}} SOMETHING THAT HAS SAND IN IT.
{{champion:432}} *Shakes head*
{{champion:268}} YOU DARE DENY ME?!?
{{champion:432}} *Shrugs*
{{champion:268}} FINE. THEN SURPRISE ME.
{{champion:432}} *Puts ginger ale in a shot glass and hands it to Azir*
#_2 minutes later..._
{{champion:15}} Oh, for goodness' sake I leave you alone for one minute...
{{champion:268}} SIVIR! *HIC* LET'S BUILD AN **EMPIRE**... OUT OF SAND!
{{champion:15}} What the hell did you give him?
{{champion:432}} *Shows the bottle of ginger ale*
{{champion:15}} Figures. He can't take an ounce of alcohol.
{{champion:268}} SIVIR, GRABBA DRINK AND COME SIT WITH ME! I WANNA TELL YA ABOUT MY FRIEND XERATH-
{{champion:15}} Yeah, no. You're coming home.
{{champion:268}} BUT WHAIII?!?
{{champion:23}} Because I'm trying to drown my sorrow in my drink and IF YOU DON'T SHUT UP I WILL FREAKNN WAAAARGHbobo-
{{champion:432}} *Throws meep with tranquilizer on it*
{{champion:23}} *Slouches to the ground*
{{champion:89}} I'll have some sunshine. If not, sparkling wine will do.
{{champion:432}} *Inquiring chime*
{{champion:98}} I'm not here for a drink. I'm here to get rid of your spirit problem.
{{champion:432}} *Understanding chime*
{{champion:98}} *Pulls out spirit sword* There you are!
Spooky {{champion:41}} YO HO HO! YE'LL NEVER CATCH ME WITH ME ORANGES!
{{champion:36}} *Quietly licking his drink out of his glass while mass mayhem goes on in the background*
{{champion:114}} Vaiteh! I weell have vine.
{{champion:432}} *Cocks head*
{{champion:114}} *Sits down and turns face away while resting head on chin* I don't care vat kind.
{{champion:24}} Lady, he doesn't serve plants here, he says.
{{champion:114}} Vat?!? How dare yoo insult me!
{{champion:24}} *Pours rest of drink into eye sockets* You wanna go?
{{champion:114}} *Pulls out sword* It vill be my pleasah.
{{champion:24}} Then put the sword away. We're going to the local carnival to win all the games. They have this really cool lava lamp post I wanna win.
{{champion:114}} Zis infuriating man... haz me intrigued. *Sheathes sword*
{{champion:104}} Did my shipment of cigars come in yet?
{{champion:432}} *Shakes head*
{{champion:104}} Darn it.
{{champion:202}} Bard! I am confused. I had four drinks, which should be perfection. Yet, I am not satiated. What does it mean?!?
{{champion:432}} *Thinks deeply, then shrugs*
{{champion:202}} *Pulls back head in agony* GAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!
{{champion:15}} Nasus! Great timing! Take Azir home.
{{champion:75}} But this is my favorite bar...
{{champion:268}} WHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!
{{champion:75}} *Defeated Sigh* Azir, let's go.
{{champion:268}} NOOOOOOOOOOOOO! I... SHALL... RETURN!
{{champion:136}} Look, Bard! I balanced the glasses on the stars, and now they're rotating around me! How cool is that!
{{champion:432}} *Nods approvingly*
{{champion:98}} *Comes out from the back room covered in orange juice, panting* Finished. May I... borrow a towel?
_____________________________________________________

#Thank you for reading my shitty post.

replies.body:
Duuude....

This....

Is....

SHENSATIONAL!!!
Hopefully none of it was inshensitive.

I remember when I did scenarios like this when I first joined the boards.

You have inspired me to try again. 

Thanks to you, I have the soluSHEN to creator's block.

http://static.tumblr.com/ooicj30/I9Fltwzyw/graceful_bow.gif

They are better comments than post material, though.

Do you have a solution to my writer's block yet?

PLEASE tell me you have an idea!

Besides the one I gave you a few days ago, nope. Sorry.

Personally I'm in a writer's slump. I recently _just_ finished the final part of Act I of my most recent fic, but the laptop of my battery died.

It ended up getting corrupted. DX

Yikes!  Well, hopefully you can recover your files.  I'd hate to see you lose all your work.

Almost happened to me once.  I save my writing on my computer, a hard drive, AND a USB now.

Might be overkill, but better safe than sorry.

Yeah, I actually write all my chapters in separate files, so my work is partially protected.

Sin admission: I actually wrote my most recent chapters in the created discussion posts on the boards themselves because I was getting lazy. 

Won't be doing that again. Lol.

Save my stuff to my computer and Google Drive, so that's something I'll go back to.

I can't even get back to rewriting the chapter because of a load of homework my professors decided to give me during the first few weeks of school.

Ok, good.

And good luck with school!

> 
> It ended up getting corrupted. DX
kek
Seriously, sorry. Hopefully it gets better.

Hot damn, better get cracking. To help you work better, have some insanity poSHEN. 

I'm so so sorry.
{{champion:27}} _laugh intensifies_
No, I am Shensational. He isn't.

HAHAHAHAHAHAAHA

This is amazing. I want more as soon as possible.

If you want more,
http://i.imgur.com/t4ueP.gif?noredirect

:D
How do I feed you, meme-master?
Shiny, green arrows pointing upwards. I need as many as possible for my nourishment.
Yes, Meme-overseer! Right away!
I wonder if anybody found the hidden reference to a Rioter I made...
Was it the "WAAAARGHbobo" line by Trynd?
Dang it. You got that too quickly.
You should've added Amumu just lonely sitting somewhere at backseat and Annie being thrown out by bouncer.
Annie would BE the bouncer

The lack of Yasuo and his sake here....

It disturbs me.
Yasuo was getting wasted at the ramen cart outside.

What I learned
1. Shen like always is a badass
2. Fiora x Jax is now a thing
3. Azir gets drunk on soda (unless you meant a literal ginger ALE) 
4. Graves still cant have his cigar 

very well done meme...

1. 500 points for Gryffindor.
2. Their couple fights must be intense.
3. He's such a lightweight he gets wasted on apple juice.
4. He'll find a way.

This is just so beautiful. A true masterpiece
http://www.totalprosports.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/11/wwe-showul-crying-sports-crying-gifs.gif

Crying cause you don't get upvotes anymore ?
What's that meme over you anyway ?
http://i.imgur.com/AxtzziK.gif?noredirect

Spinning too much !!! I need to ...

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
The Gangplank part was gold.
Orange.
{{champion:41}} :  I'm king of the seas!  but especially vitamin C
Rumor has it Gangplank can remove two of the seven C's at once when he eats an orange.
https://media3.giphy.com/media/l4HnKwxpPDoPmL9bG/200w.gif#1
Do you want to see the NSFW version?
These kind of posts are why I lurk around the lol boards. Thank you c:
Clearly, Jhin need 40 more shots
Sorry, has to downvote you to 4.
More like 4440 more!

{{champion:202}} ...Yes, that would give me four 4's... but by only adding THREE more...
{{champion:432}} *Thinks deeply, then shrugs*
{{champion:202}} *Pulls back head in agony... again* GAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!
lol the Spooky gangplank and Shen part got me pretty hard.

> [{quoted}](name=Knalxz,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=LE30sJJ9,comment-id=001e,timestamp=2017-01-20T18:27:08.887+0000)
>
> lol the Spooky gangplank and Shen part **got me pretty hard.**

Anything involving Shenpai gets me hard. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Bard-tender, I'm done lol
I am so confused yet aroused
That makes two of us.
I logged in just to upvote this. This is truly beautiful.

Looks like you're famous now: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/5p2tw2/so_azir_walks_into_a_bard/

At least, more famous. You're already pretty well-known here.
